Package com.cognifide.qa.bb.utils

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AnnotationsHelper
    Helper class with methods for managing annotations.
    AopUtil  
    BrowserTabsHelper
    This is helper class that provides methods for checking count and switching between opened web browser tabs.
    PageObjectInjector
    This class extends Guice's Injector functionality by adding a bunch of "inject" methods, with various parameters that describe context of the injection.
    PropertyUtils
    This class contains utility methods for loading properties from classpath and system.
    WebElementUtils
    This class contains utility methods for checking with waits if WebElements are meeting different conditions.
    XpathUtils
    A handy set of tools to work with XPATH locators
